name: Twijj
longDescription: Twijj is a web platform that allows users to live stream and share content with any number of other viewers online.
Along with streaming or viewing streams, users can also interact with each other through a live chat in each stream, and communicate with the stream host.
Twijj was developed in a group as part of the SENG 513 course at the University of Calgary.

name: Shuttr
longDescription: Shuttr is an interface concept for a photography social network, allowing users to share and discuss photography.
Users can upload photos, browse photos from other users, and create or participate in discussion posts.
Shuttr was designed in a group as part of the CPSC 481 course at the University of Calgary.
